person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night. I need some help.
animal_say: I'm sorry to hear that! There’s a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation and stress relief. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will help you find those relaxation techniques. Let’s go meet him!
